name: OpenAI For WordPress – #1 Content Generator
author: Adrian Martinez

sections.description:
Are you tired of spending hours, days, weeks, months, or even years creating content for your WordPress site, only to wonder if it’ll be good enough to drive traffic? Don’t have the time or money to hire someone to do it for you? No worries!

With OpenAI’s cutting-edge AI tools like GPT-3 and Jurassic-1, you can easily generate top-notch content without lifting a finger. Simply give the AI a rundown of what you’re looking for, and let it do the rest. No more struggling to come up with ideas or spending hours editing and publishing. Let the AI handle it all so you can focus on what you love!

Plus, with these advanced AI tools, you can feel confident that the content you’re publishing is top-quality and sure to attract readers and viewers. So why waste your precious time and energy struggling to create content when you can let the AI do it for you? Try out OpenAI’s content generation tools today and see the difference they can make for your WordPress site!

HOW DOES IT WORKS?

IMPORTANT: In order to use this plugin, you will need to provide your own OpenAI / AI21 Studio API key as this is a Bring-Your-Own-Key (BYOK) application.

Ready to use cutting-edge AI technology to generate content for your WordPress site? Here’s what you need to do:

  1. Sign up for an account at OpenAI or AI21 Studio to get your API key for the AI engine of your choice (GPT-3 or Jurassic-1).

  2. Insert the API key into OpenAI to connect your WordPress site with the AI engine.

  3. Once your site is connected, head to the post editor to generate content. Simply give the AI a prompt like “Write an article outline about (topic)” or “Write three headlines for (topic)”, and let it do the rest.

  4. Review the generated content, make any necessary edits, and then hit publish! It’s that easy to create top-quality content in record time.

This plugin is free.

You only need to pay for API calls to OpenAI

Skip the middleman and go straight to the source! Give it a try yourself to see the difference it can make.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate OpenAI from Plugins page
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin without access to GPT-3 / Jurassic-1 API?

No, you can’t. You must sign up for an account at OpenAI or AI21 Studio to get their respective API key in order to use this plugin.
